DECISION FRAMEWORK:

âœ… >= 5 users say "I want to keep using"

âš ï¸  3-4 users want to continue
âš ï¸  50-79% follow Kakeibo model
â†’ ACTION: Refine concept based on feedback, re-test

RED LIGHT (Pivot - Stop or Change Direction):
âŒ < 5 users complete testing
âŒ < 3 users want to continue
âŒ < 50% follow Kakeibo model
â†’ ACTION: 
  - Analyze WHY failed
  - Consider different segment

VALIDATION CHECKLIST:

- [ ] 7 days manual MVP completed
- [ ] User feedback documented
- [ ] Go/No-Go criteria evaluated
- [ ] Decision made and communicated

OUTPUT:

- docs/go-no-go-decision.md (decision with rationale)
- Next phase roadmap (if GO) OR pivot plan (if NO-GO)

TIMELINE: Week 2-3 of validation phase

notes:

SETUP KHÃ”NG Cáº¦N CODE:
- Option 1: Google Forms (nháº­n expense submissions)
- Option 2: Google Sheets (manual tracking)

PROTOCOL:

  - Google Form: https://forms.gleliche/

GO/NO-GO DECISION:
GREEN (Build CLI):
- >= 7 users complete 1 week
- >= 5 users say "I want to keep using"
- >= 80% entries follow Kakeibo naturally
